caption.p: Schematic illustration of fatty acid content in pomegranate fruit tissues from varieties of different origin. The values presented are average values of the percentage of each fatty acid of the total fatty acids measured. (A) Seed oils by Pande and Akoh ( 2009), Ferrara et al. ( 2014), and Verardo et al. ( 2014); (B) non-seed fruit tissues by Pande and Akoh ( 2009).
